name: Lie of change
description:
Read first:

Drog and drop t&e card to move and see the change. 

Use eye card to see which is which is the lie. 

Red arrow is danger while blue arrow is safe. 

the game is about telling which is which is the lie upon the tiles. Finding the right path to ensure safety.

This gamae was made using mobile phone Construct 3

Free version. 

If u want to make this a full for mobile or pc donate me.
